name: Raiders of the Broken Planet: Wardog Fury
storyline: Harec wants the renegade Loaht to join his Raiders. It won't be easy to find him, much less convince him. Not to mention there are Wardog detachments looking for him to take him out. Loaht should have never betrayed General Marmalade, a former drug trafficker turned Wardog messiah and unrepentant Aleph addict. The General takes no prisoners. He wants all the Aleph from the Broken Planet for himself, and he’s not far from achieving his goal. The way things are now, the wrath of Loaht could be the Raiders’ only hope. If they find him alive...
summary: With this DLC you get new missions, a new playable character, a new skin as well as instant access to the single-player mode in the campaign.
